ygData.subject: Guilds vs. Solo
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen a lot of people with guild names on my server and I was really wondering what the benefit of being in a guild would be to going it without one??? I
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen a lot of people with guild names on my server and I was really
wondering what the benefit of being in a guild would be to going it without
one???

I mean I can always find someone to group with... or solo it on the blue's
and blacks....

Other then maybe another aspect added to the role playing game what benefit
do you recieve from a Guild.

ok got to run just wondering
